scripts.allure:report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-report rmdir /q /s allure-report && if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /q /s cypress\screenshots && if exist cypress\videos rmdir /q /s cypress\videos
scripts.test: npm run cy:run || npm run posttest
